articles.title: TechnipFMC to Speak at Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026
articles.mainIdea: TechnipFMC to Speak at Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026
articles.summary: Business Wire: TechnipFMC to Speak at Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026. NEWCASTLE & HOUSTON, December 22, 2025--TechnipFMC (NYSE: FTI) announced today that Doug Pferdehirt, Chair and Chief Executive Officer, will speak at the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026 on Tuesday, January 6, 2026, at 1:40 p.m. ET in Aventura, FL. Related tickers mentioned: FTI.

articles.title: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'
articles.mainIdea: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'. Major bank stocks are poised to close 2025 with serious gains; most notably, Citigroup shares (C) are already up 67% while Goldman Sachs (GS) has surged 57% (or nearly $330) year-to-date. Whalen Global Advisors founder and chairman Chris Whalen — alongside TPW Advisory founder Jay Pelosky — speaks with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman about his consensus on the banking sector heading into 2026, citing various corporate credit risks amid the Federal Reserve Related tickers mentioned: BAC, C, JPM, MS, MS-PQ, WFC, XLF.

articles.title: Market Chatter: Wells Fargo to Enter Options Clearing Market
articles.mainIdea: Market Chatter: Wells Fargo to Enter Options Clearing Market
articles.summary: MT Newswires: Market Chatter: Wells Fargo to Enter Options Clearing Market. Wells Fargo (WFC) is expanding its global-markets business into options clearing, a capital-intensiv Related tickers mentioned: BAC, WFC.
